title: Charlaine Harris Collection - eReader Format [EbonyGold]
description:
Sookie Stackhouse
1. Dead Until Dark
2. Living Dead In Dallas
3. Club Dead
4. One Word Answers
5. Dead as Doornail
6. Definately Dead
7. All Together Dead

Aurora Teagarden
1. Real Murders
2. A Bone To Pick
3. Three Bedrooms, One Corpse
4. The Julius Hous
5. Dead Over Heels
6. A Fool And His Honey
7. Last Scene Alive
8. Poppy Done To Death

Lily Bard
1. Shakespeare's Landlord
2. Shakespeare's Champion
3. Shakespeare's Christmas
4. Shakespeare's Trollop
5. Shakespeare's Couselor

Harper Connelly
1. Grave Sight
2. Grave Surprise
3. An Ice Cold Grave


To read these books you need the program eReader (available for hand held devices- go to eReader.com for instructions on how to load these books onto your device)
There are programs that are able to read these files on computer, but I know nothing of them so please do not ask me for help!

Please note if you are a formatting junkie I would recommend you do NOT download these books. All I do for my formatting is remove the section breaks - all spelling and grammatical errors remain as they were, as do paragraph errors.
I do however change the properties so the books will come up with Title and Author in eReader.
All these books are available in the more mainstream formates (pdf, lit, doc, html). Just search and you will find!
All files are virus scanned and are clean.
